mapper.select: select a.id,a.road_id,a.batch,a.licence_plate,a.unloaded_weight,a.loading_weight,a.loading_temperature,a.pitch_type,a.datetime_in, a.datetime_out,a.edit_user_id,a.edit_datetime,a.delete_state,b.fl_name as pitchTypeName,c.road_name,usr.u_name from batch_mgt a left join sys_formulation_management b on a.pitch_type=b.fl_id left join sys_road_mgn c on a.road_id=c.road_id LEFT JOIN u_user usr ON a.edit_user_id = usr.user_id and usr.delete_state = 1 where a.delete_state=1

SELECT bm.*,(bm.loading_weight-bm.unloaded_weight) yuguweight,srm.road_name,srm.road_no,sfm.fl_name FROM batch_mgt bm LEFT JOIN sys_road_mgn srm ON bm.road_id = srm.road_id AND srm.delete_state = 1 LEFT JOIN sys_formulation_management sfm on sfm.fl_id = bm.pitch_type and sfm.delete_state = 1 where bm.delete_state = 1 and id=#{id}
mapper.update: update batch_mgt set road_id=#{bm.roadId}, batch=#{bm.batch}, licence_plate=#{bm.licencePlate}, unloaded_weight=#{bm.unloadedWeight}, loading_weight=#{bm.loadingWeight}, loading_temperature=#{bm.loadingTemperature}, pitch_type=#{bm.pitchType}, datetime_in=#{bm.datetimeIn}, datetime_out=#{bm.datetimeOut}, edit_user_id=#{bm.editUserId}, edit_datetime=#{bm.editDatetime} where id=#{bm.id}
update batch_mgt set delete_state=0 where id=#{id}
mapper.select: select top 1 id,licence_plate,unloaded_weight,datetime_in from batch_mgt where licence_plate=#{licencePlate} and loading_weight is null and delete_state=1 order by datetime_in desc
